beginning.definition: What starts the game and draws the protagonist into the story. This could involve an event or a piece of information that propels the player into the story.

ending.definition: What wraps up the game and sends the protagonist on their way. This should include a climax or an emotional climax that is necessary for the game to have a satisfying ending.

synopsis.definition: A short paragraph describing the central conflict(s) of the game. This should be no longer than a few sentences and should provide no spoilers.
